price: Wannan shĩ ne halittar Allah. To ku nũna mini, "Mẽne ne waɗanan da ba Shi ba suka halitta? Ã'a, azzalumai sunã a cikin ɓata bayyananna."
arabic: هَٰذَا خَلۡقُ ٱللَّهِ فَأَرُونِي مَاذَا خَلَقَ ٱلَّذِينَ مِن دُونِهِۦۚ بَلِ ٱلظَّٰلِمُونَ فِي ضَلَٰلٖ مُّبِينٖ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: hādhā khalqu al-lahi fa-arūnī mādhā khalaqa alladhīna min dūnihi bali al-ẓālimūna fī ḍalālin mubīnin
